youtube.title: How Your Period Actually Works | 3D Menstrual Cycle Animation
youtube.description: Discover the biological process of the menstrual cycle in this clear 3D animation. We explain how the uterine lining prepares for pregnancy and why menstruation occurs when fertilization doesn't happen. Perfect for students and anyone curious about women's health!
